ProductInfo.Features:
GW8608H: Professional 8 Channel H.264 DVR, iPhone, Android Viewing. HDMI & VGA. 16 bit true color graphical menu interface; embedded real-time Linux operation system. Preview, record, playback, backup, network surveillance. USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control
GW37H: 1/3" HDIS CCD Outdoor/Indoor Security Camera, 650TV Line, 3.6mm Lens, 24PCS Infrared LED, 49 feet IR distance, 0.1 Lux Min. illumination. Weather proof, Water proof.
GW86H: 1/3" HDIS CCD Camera, 650TV Line, 3.6mm lens, 12PCS Infrared LED, 26 feet IR distance, 0.1 Lux Min.illumination
Package Includes:     GW8608H DVR with 2TB HDD;     GWLED19IN  - Free 19" Wide Screen LED monitor;     3 x GW37H - 1/3" HDIS CCD Outdoor Camera;     3 x GW86H - 1/3" HDIS CCD Indoor Camera;
1 x GW125CAW: 125 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW100CAW: 100 feet pre-made cable BNC; 3 x GW60CAW: 60 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x GW25CAW: 25 feet pre-made cable BNC; 1 x 12V2A Power Supply For Security Cameras; 1 x 1 to 8 Power Splitter Adapter Cable.
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security Inc 6CHV9 8 Channel H.264 DVR with 6 x 1/3" HDIS CCD Security Camera, 650TV Line, 3.6mm Lens Surveillance System, Free LED Monitor (White/Black)
